description.value:
You add two of the following powers to your spellbook.

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-4e-compendium.module-powers.rL14p2CRAJ6DaNzB]{Cone of Cold}@UUID[Compendium.dnd-4e-compendium.module-powers.6NGxduBMyfrVR8DP]{Mental Maelstrom}@UUID[Compendium.dnd-4e-compendium.module-powers.h8tIkuKvMVyPGNzQ]{Slumber of the Winter Court}
